#include <cstdio>


int t,n,x1,x2,y1,y2,x3,y3,x4,y4,xp1,yp1,xp2,yp2,p1,p2,pp;

int main () {
scanf("%d",&t);
for (int i=1;i<=t;i++){
scanf("%d %d %d %d %d %d %d %d",&x1,&y1,&x2,&y2,&x3,&y3,&x4,&y4);
if(x1>x3) xp1=x1; else xp1=x3;
if(y1>y3) yp1=y1; else yp1=y3;
if(x2<x4) xp2=x2; else xp2=x4;
if(y2<y4) yp2=y2; else yp2=y4;
if((xp1>=xp2)or(yp1>=yp2)) pp=0;
else pp=(xp2-xp1)*(yp2-yp1);
p1=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1);
p2=(x4-x3)*(y4-y3);
printf("%d\n",p1+p2-pp);
}

return 0;
}
